quote: One, don’t wait for inspiration, just start the damned thing. Two, once you begin, keep on until the end. How do you know how the story should begin until you find out where it’s going?
quote_letters: ONE DONT WAIT FOR INSPIRATION JUST START THE DAMNED THING TWO ONCE YOU BEGIN KEEP ON UNTIL THE END HOW DO YOU KNOW HOW THE STORY SHOULD BEGIN UNTIL YOU FIND OUT WHERE ITS GOING
